thread.title: Orange County Community & Tourism Guide Website
thread.title_full: Orange County Community & Tourism Guide Website

title: Orange County Community & Tourism Guide Website
text: Questions Business Summary As people continue to spend time and money on food and entertainment, the community guide business continues to grow. In addition, with the latest Google update making directory sites more prominent, it is becoming more important than ever for local businesses to advertise on Directory Sites to increase their exposure. This website has great content and is the authority site for one of the most desirable areas in the world, Orange County - California! It is one of the first and most visited community and tourism guides to Orange County, California and has maintained the highest rankings on many searches for both tourism and community related keyword terms. While free to users/visitors, members pay a fee for the online service. As a membership based website, the business is run from a home based office, is easily relocateable and can be operated from any location with internet access. The business is operated by two owners, working 40 hours per week combined. The owners handle sales, collections, re-sales, and billing. There is one contractor who works approx. 20 hours per week, handling website admin events, listings, updates & some inquiries and customer service. The site has an excellent, exact match domain name perfectly suited for its business model as an authority site providing information about Orange County. It offers great potential for any web, guide or tourism company to dominate in this internet business niche. The listing is priced based accordingly on the business' excellent fundamentals as well as its valuable domain name. Well established with solid profits, exact match domain, large traffic, great keyword positioning and lots of potential for future growth, this an exceptional opportunity for a buyer to acquire! Financials
